description:
Have you ever wondered what goes on in the school`s faculty room? The students of 4-1 discover more than they bargained for! Meanwhile, a fallen hero confronts his dark side, and Steve learns the wisdom of the ancients.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Anata no Shiranai Shokuinshitsu / Perfect Plate / Ashita Tsukaeru Hieroglyph Kouza
The Faculty Room You Don`t Get to See / Perfect Plate / A Practical Hieroglyphics Lesson
あなたの知らない職員室 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 明日使えるヒエログリフ講座
